abilities.name: Their Number Is Legion
abilities.description: Each time this unit makes a Reanimation Protocols roll, you can re-roll one of the dice.

abilities.name: Implacable Eradication
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals, Lychguard, or Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: My Will Be Done
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Hit roll for attacks made by models in that unit.

abilities.name: Resurrection Orb
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of your Command phase, you can select one friendly NECRONS unit within 6". That unit's Reanimation Protocols heal 2D3 wounds instead of D3 this phase.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals or Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strategy
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Engrammatic Logic
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly NECRONS unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Guardian Protocols
abilities.description: While a NOBLE model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than this unit's Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Whirling Onslaught
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If this unit made a Charge move this turn, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

abilities.name: Devastating Charge
abilities.description: Each time this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [Devastating Wounds] ability.

abilities.name: Self-Destruction
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this unit. Roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

rules.name: Command Protocols
rules.description: At the start of the battle round, you can select one of the Command Protocols listed below to be active for your army until the end of the battle round. Each Command Protocol can only be selected once per battle.

protocols.name: Protocol of the Eternal Guardian
protocols.description: Each time an attack is allocated to a NECRONS model from your army, if that model is within range of an objective marker, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack (minimum 1).

protocols.name: Protocol of the Sudden Storm
protocols.description: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of NECRONS models from your army.

protocols.name: Protocol of the Conquering Tyrant
protocols.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of NECRONS models from your army.

protocols.name: Protocol of the Hungry Void
protocols.description: Each time a NECRONS model from your army makes a melee attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

protocols.name: Protocol of the Undying Legions
protocols.description: Each time a NECRONS unit from your army makes a Reanimation Protocols roll, you can re-roll that roll.

stratagems.name: Protocol of the Conquering Tyrant
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem at the start of the battle round. Select one NECRONS INFANTRY unit from your army. Until the end of the battle round, add 2 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit (instead of 1 from the Command Protocol).

stratagems.name: Resurrection Orb
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem at the start of your Command phase. Select one NECRONS unit from your army that is making Reanimation Protocols rolls this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time that unit makes a Reanimation Protocols roll, add 1 to that roll.

stratagems.name: Solar Pulse
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in your Shooting phase, just after a NECRONS unit from your army has selected its targets. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, the target does not receive the benefit of cover against that attack.

stratagems.name: Enslaved Protectors
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem at the start of any phase. Select one NECRONS CHARACTER unit from your army that is within 3" of a friendly LYCHGUARD unit. Until the end of the phase, while your CHARACTER unit is within 3" of that LYCHGUARD unit, each time an attack is made against your CHARACTER unit, that LYCHGUARD unit can use its Guardian Protocols ability even if your CHARACTER unit is not leading it.

stratagems.name: Disruption Fields
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in the Fight phase, just after a NECRONS unit from your army has selected its targets. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: Undying Warriors
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem at the start of your Command phase. Select one NECRONS unit from your army. Until the start of your next Command phase, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

enhancements.name: Veil of Darkness
enhancements.description: NECRONS model only. Once per battle, at the end of your opponent's turn, the bearer's unit can be removed from the battlefield and set up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

enhancements.name: Sempiternal Weave
enhancements.description: NECRONS model only. Add 1 to the Wounds characteristic of the bearer. In addition, each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack (minimum 1).

enhancements.name: Hypermaterial Ablator
enhancements.description: NECRONS model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds. In addition, each time a ranged attack targets the bearer's unit, if the bearer is not in engagement range of any enemy units, models in the bearer's unit have the Stealth ability.

enhancements.name: The Sovereign Coronal
enhancements.description: NECRONS model only. While the bearer is on the battlefield, each time you select a Command Protocol to be active for your army, you can select one additional NECRONS CORE unit within 6" of the bearer. Until the end of the battle round, that unit benefits from that Command Protocol as if it was Battle Round 5 (receiving the maximum bonus).

reanimation_protocols.name: Reanimation Protocols
reanimation_protocols.description: At the start of each of your Command phases, each unit from your army with this ability that has one or more models with fewer than their starting number of wounds heals D3 wounds. Each time such a unit heals wounds, until the end of your Command phase, you can resurrect models in that unit. Each time you do, select one destroyed model from that unit. It is returned to the unit with 1 wound remaining.

weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds (unmodified wound roll of 6) inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic, and the attack sequence ends.
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits: Critical hits generate additional hits (number specified after the ability name).
weaponKeywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (at -1 to hit).
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range, but only at units within Engagement Range.
weaponKeywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit (minimum 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire: Double the Attacks characteristic when targeting within half range.
weaponKeywords.Heavy: +1 to hit if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this turn.
weaponKeywords.Anti-: Improves wound roll against targets with the specified keyword (e.g., Anti-Vehicle 4+ wounds on 4+ vs Vehicles).
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll one D6. On a 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds.
weaponKeywords.Melta: When targeting within half range, add X to the Damage characteristic (Melta 2 = +2 Damage).

weapon.name: Anti-X #+
weapon.description: Improve AP by 1 and wound on #+ against targets with keyword X.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: +1 Attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage, no saves allowed.

weapon.name: Extra Attacks
weapon.description: Attacks with this weapon are made in addition to other weapons.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After resolving attacks, roll D6. On 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds (Characters) or is destroyed (other models).

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: +1 to Hit if unit Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not benefit from cover.

weapon.name: Indirect Fire
weapon.description: Can target units not visible. -1 to Hit, +1 to target's Save if not visible.

weapon.name: Lance
weapon.description: +1 to Wound if unit charged this turn.

weapon.name: Lethal Hits
weapon.description: Critical hits automatically wound (no wound roll needed).

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: +X Damage against targets within half range.

weapon.name: One Shot
weapon.description: Can only be used once per battle.

weapon.name: Pistol
weapon.description: Can be shot in Engagement Range, but only at units in Engagement Range.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On critical wounds, attacker can allocate wound to a Character or Attached model.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: +X Attacks when targeting units within half range.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits score X additional hits.

faction.name: Reanimation Protocols
faction.description: At the start of each Command phase, units with this ability heal D3 wounds and can resurrect destroyed models. Returned models come back with 1 wound remaining. This represents the Necrons' ability to self-repair and reanimate fallen warriors.

faction.name: Necrons
faction.description: The faction keyword for all Necron units. Ancient robotic warriors who once ruled the galaxy, now awakening from millions of years of slumber to reclaim their empire.

faction.name: Destroyer Cult
faction.description: Units consumed by hatred and the need to destroy all life. Often have abilities focused on dealing damage. Key units: Skorpekh Destroyers, Lokhust Destroyers.

unit.name: Battleline
unit.description: Core troop units. May have special rules in certain detachments.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: Can lead units, receive Enhancements, and is targeted by Precision.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to Bodyguard units. Abilities affect the combined unit.

unit.name: Feel No Pain X+
unit.description: Roll D6 when losing a wound. On X+, wound is ignored.

unit.name: Deadly Demise X
unit.description: When destroyed, roll D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers X mortal wounds.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: Can be set up in Reserves. Arrives during Reinforcements step, more than 9" from enemy units.
